channel.title: Riccardo Lo Faro
channel.description: Recent content on Riccardo Lo Faro

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Riccardo, a Software Engineer working remotely for Relatech (Milan, Italy). I specialize in building applications specific to the business needs of my clients. I have done work in front-end in HTML, CSS, JQuery, Angular, back-end web in Spring Boot and Laravel, database/server management and video game development with Unity in my free time. I am always experimenting, always learning, and never bored. Out of the office you’ll find me dreaming of kitesurf, taking photos and petting all the good dogs.
